description: Actress Shelley Duvall, known for her roles in The Shining and a number of Robert Altman’s films, has died at home in Texas of complications related to diabetes, according to her partner Dan Gilroy.
title: Shelley Duvall, star of 'The Shining,' 'Popeye,' dies at 75

description: The BBC confirmed that the women killed were members of the family of its commentator John Hunt. The suspect, Kyle Clifford, was detained in north London after the brutal crossbow attack.
title: British police find suspect after killing of BBC commentator's wife and 2 daughters

description: The National Highway Traffic Safety Administration said the recall includes certain 3 Series Sedans and 3 Series Sportswagons. BMW dealers will inspect and replace air bag modules as needed for free.
title: BMW recalling more than 390,000 vehicles due to airbag inflator issue
